triples.name: Formal methods
triples.relevance: The paper surveys formal methods as the primary approach for verifying and validating machine learning systems.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the primary domain of the paper's focus for applying formal verification techniques.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper examines formal methods applicable to both machine learning and the broader field of artificial intelligence.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the central verification technique used to provide correctness guarantees for ML systems.

triples.name: Support vector machine
triples.relevance: Support vector machines are specifically addressed in the paper's review of formal verification techniques for particular ML models.

triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: Decision tree ensembles are examined as a specific class of machine learning systems subject to formal verification methods.

triples.name: Data preparation
triples.relevance: The paper reviews formal methods developed for validating the data preparation phase of machine learning systems.

triples.name: Ensemble learning
triples.relevance: Ensemble learning methods, particularly decision tree ensembles, are subject to the formal verification techniques surveyed.
